data.title: Best BBQ in Ottawa, Ohio
data.meta_description: Red Pig Inn offers Award Winning Sauces and Signature Recipes as the go-to BBQ destination in Northwest Ohio. Come in and see us today.
data.text:
The Red Pig Inn.

Voted Best of the Region in Ribs and BBQ

Red Pig Inn, in Ottawa, offers award-winning sauces and signature recipes as the go-to bbq restaurant in northwest Ohio.

Our Menu

Try our delicious made from scratch sides and world famous BBQ

Order Takeout

Online ordering will be coming soon, but for now, give us a call to place an order to go.

Events & Special

We keep things lively at the Red Pig, check out of specials & live entertainment

Apps

Apps

Salads

Salads

Entrees

Entrees

BBQ

BBQ

Sides

Sides

Plan Your Next Event With Us

Our gorgeous banquet rooms and exquisite catering services are perfect for any type of event, including corporate events, birthday parties, rehearsal dinners, showers, holiday gatherings or graduation celebrations.

Spacious rooms

Private entrance and parking

Full service catering menu

If you're looking for a fun night out, Red Pig is the place to be!

Every Wednesday join us for Singo, along with Monday Night Wing Specials and Monthly Menu Specials. We also feature live entertainment every weekend in February – so don’t miss it!

Mouth-watering food for your special occasion!

If you’re searching for the best bbq for your guests, look no further! Our delectable selection of meats and sides are sure to please any palate. And with our experienced team at hand, we can craft a customized spread that will make your event truly one-of-a kind.

Choose from delicious BBQ options

Select the perfect made from scratch sides

Top it all off with salad and bread included too

Stay in the know!
